calculations.name: Stability Tier
calculations.tableau_expression: IF [Revenue Stability]>200 THEN "Stable" ELSEIF  [Revenue Stability] >50 THEN "Moderate" ELSE "Unstable" END

calculation_context.Expression: IF [Revenue Stability]>200 THEN "Stable" ELSEIF  [Revenue Stability] >50 THEN "Moderate" ELSE "Unstable" END
